attributes.action: Stop the closure of Abbey Hill School and Performaing Arts College, Stoke
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the proposals of Serco, Stoke council are planning to close Abbey Hill School and Performing Arts College and replace it with a "new" school attached to Birches Head High.
Abbey Hill is an MLD school with specialist Autistic Provision, the only school in the Stoke area to offer this, we believe. A recent Ofsted report called them "outstanding" and they are a Beacon school. Abbey Hill is also a Performing Arts College and has only in recent years opened it specialist Autistic Unit.
The un-needed closure of this school will drasticaly affect the rights of Special Needs children, and in particular those with ASD, to an appropriate education.
Please support this petition to stop the proposed closure.
